name: Burle
description: Roberto Burle-Marx is one of my idols (along with Brazilian Athos Bulc√£o and Escher) and since I was born in Rio I was, indeed influenced by the curves in his works. Not only on the famous sidewalks in Rio, but also his magnificent gardens and tapestry. This piece is inspired on his work. The image posted here is a 3D simulation of the art in a frame (the floor and wall are also 3D render).  After purchasing you'll get the high resolution digital file (.ai) It is also a unit from a repeat, this
